results.title: Metformin's impact on statin-associated muscle symptoms: An analysis of ACCORD study data and research materials from the NHLBI Biologic Specimen and Data Repository Information Coordinating Center.
results.text_hl: No validated therapy for statin @<m>DISEASE_Myalgia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D063806 @@@muscle pain@@@ exists. The goal of the study was to assess whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was associated with reduced @<m>DISEASE_Myalgia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D063806 @@@muscle pain@@@.

results.title: A challenging case of diffuse diabetic musculoskeletal system involvement: diagnostic confusion with rheumatoid arthritis.
results.text_hl: Her past medical history disclosed that she had been using @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ due to @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@ for 8 years.

results.title: Impact of 6 weeks of treatment with low-dose metformin and atorvastatin on glucose-induced changes of endothelial function in adults with newly diagnosed type 2 diabetes mellitus: A single-blind study.
results.text_hl: METHODS: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ with newly diagnosed @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@ were recruited and were randomly assigned to receive @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ 850 mg/d or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ 850 mg/d + @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ 10 mg/d for 6 weeks in a single-blind study.

results.title: Familial partial lipodystrophy associated with the heterozygous LMNA mutation 1445G>A (Arg482Gln) in a Polish family.
results.text_hl: A 34-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ admitted with @<m>DISEASE_Myalgia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D063806 @@@myalgia@@@ and cushingoid appearance was found to have a round face with double chin, neck bump, and loss of fat on extremities.

results.title: A Latent Autoimmune Diabetes in Adults Patient Manifesting Severe Musculoskeletal Complications
results.text_hl: He had been treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, but his glycemic control was very poor with a glycated hemoglobin of 14.5%.
